name: Tunche: Arena (itch)
description:
Tunche: Arena is a free playable version of an upcoming 2D beat'em up Tunche, which tells a mysterious story based on a legend of Peruvian folklore. Get through hordes of enemies to challenge a powerful Boss, or test your strength and see how far can you get in the endless mode.

Features:
  • Meet Rumi the Shaman, one of the four playable characters of Tunche and use vast arsenal of her skills to defeat your enemies.
  • Get familiar with Tunche’s fighting system combining classic beat’em up gameplay, magical abilities and stylish grade system.
  • Choose from two game modes: Horde or Endless.
  • Fight your way through waves of enemies to the Boss in Arena mode.
  • Take the challenge to the next level with Endless mode and see how far you can get.

Keep in mind that Arena doesn’t have all the features the full version of Tunche will have and was developed for gaming audiences to get familiar with the game's concept.
